public abstract class SimpleNLG4Test
extends junit.framework.TestCase

This class is the base class for all JUnit simplenlg.test cases for simplenlg. It sets up a a JUnit fixture, i.e. the basic objects (basic constituents) that all other tests can use.

Author:
agatt
